author: Brett Samuels
title: Trump says he'd like economy to reopen 'with a big bang' but acknowledges it may be limited
description: President Trump said Tuesday night he'd like to see the entire U.S. economy reopen with a "big bang," but acknowledged it will be difficult to manage as certain parts of the country grapple with outbreaks."I'd love...
